name: Serious Business (FractalFireball, Charles)
description:
Submission for Zenojam #6.

Serious Business is a task management game based in an office setting.  The better you perform your office tasks the better the stocks do. How many days can you make it in this chaotic work environment?

Controls:

Requires mouse and keyboard

Keys: Perform keyboard task

Left Mouse Button: Grab objects, punch monitor, close ads

Right Mouse button: Flip off co-workers

Guide:

In order to keep the stocks going up you must perform tasks at your office desk.

  • When your computer monitor stops working punch it until it does.
  • When pesky ads appear on your screen, close them.
  • When keys appear on your screen, press the corresponding letter on your keyboard.
  • When annoying co-workers try to distract you, flip them off to get them to go away.
  • When the phone rings, pick it up.
  • When your coffee meter gets low, grab your trusty coffee mug.
